remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性应与以下参数一起使用。The property is intended to be used with the following parameters. |参数Parameter|描述Description| |---------------|-----------------| |`RowAbsolute`|`true` 为的绝对引用; 返回行否则为`false`。`true` to return the row as an absolute reference; otherwise, `false`. 默认值为 `true`。The default value is `true`.| |`ColumnAbsolute`|`true` 若要为的绝对引用; 返回的列否则为`false`。`true` to return the column as an absolute reference; otherwise, `false`. 默认值为 `true`。The default value is `true`.| |`ReferenceStyle`| 值之一。One of the values.| |`External`|`true` 若要返回的外部引用;`false`返回的本地引用。`true` to return an external reference; `false` to return a local reference. 默认值为 `false`。The default value is `false`.| |`RelativeTo`|A ，它定义的起始点。A that defines the starting point. 如果`RowAbsolute`和`ColumnAbsolute`是`false`，和`ReferenceStyle`是，必须包含一个起始点，相对的引用。If `RowAbsolute` and `ColumnAbsolute` are `false`, and `ReferenceStyle` is , you must include a starting point for the relative reference.| 如果你尝试使用而不指定任何参数，将获取对象属于的 Office 开发工具在 Visual Studio 基础结构和不应在代码中直接使用。If you attempt to use without specifying any parameters, will get an object that is part of the Office development tools in Visual Studio infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code. ## 可选参数Optional Parameters 可选参数的信息，请参阅[Office 解决方案中的可选参数](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions.md)。For information on optional parameters, see [Optional Parameters in Office Solutions](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用属性显示的范围位置。The following code example uses the property to display the range location of an . 该示例使用的不同组合`ReferenceStyle`， `RowAbsolute`，`ColumnAbsolute`和`RelativeTo`参数以四种不同格式显示范围位置。The example uses different combinations of the `ReferenceStyle`, `RowAbsolute`, `ColumnAbsolute` and `RelativeTo` parameters to display the range location in four different formats. 此代码示例假定当前工作表包含名为`CustomerLastNameCell`。This code example assumes that the current worksheet contains an named `CustomerLastNameCell`. 如果`CustomerLastNameCell`是单元格 A2，该示例将显示的地址字符串"$A$ 2"，"$A2"、"R2C2"和"R [-1] C [-1]"。If `CustomerLastNameCell` is at cell A2, the example will display the address strings "$A$2", "$A2", "R2C2", and "R[-1]C[-1]". Examples 下面的代码示例使用属性显示的范围位置。The following code example uses the property to display the range location of an . 该示例使用的不同组合`ReferenceStyle`， `RowAbsolute`，`ColumnAbsolute`和`RelativeTo`参数以四种不同格式显示范围位置。The example uses different combinations of the `ReferenceStyle`, `RowAbsolute`, `ColumnAbsolute` and `RelativeTo` parameters to display the range location in four different formats. 位置字符串将根据系统运行的语言进行本地化。The location strings will be localized according to the language of the system it is run on. 此代码示例假定当前工作表包含名为`CustomerLastNameCell`。This code example assumes that the current worksheet contains an named `CustomerLastNameCell`. 如果使用德语语言支持的系统上运行该示例和`CustomerLastNameCell`是单元格 A2，该示例将显示的地址字符串"$A$ 2"，"$A2"、"Z2S2"和"Z-[1] S [-1]"。If the example is run on a system using German language support and `CustomerLastNameCell` is at cell A2, the example will display the address strings "$A$2", "$A2", "Z2S2", and "Z[-1]S[-1]". summary.span: 基于 OLAP 数据源为 XML 映射范围内的所有已编辑单元格执行写回操作。

span.span: Performs a writeback operation for all edited cells in an XML mapped range based on an OLAP data source.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法将执行 UPDATE CUBE 语句，在 XML 中进行的所有更改映射范围，因为最后一个应用的更改操作已提交。The method will execute an UPDATE CUBE statement for all changes made in the XML mapped range since the last apply changes operation was committed. 如果范围基于非 OLAP 数据源上执行，则此方法会生成运行时错误。This method generates a run-time error if it is executed on a range based on a non-OLAP data source. > [!NOTE] > 此方法将显示在 IntelliSense Excel 2007 项目中面向[!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)]。This method appears in IntelliSense in Excel 2007 projects that target the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)]. 但是，不能在 Excel 2007 项目中使用此方法。However, this method cannot be used in Excel 2007 projects.

exception.span: 此属性用于 Excel 2007 项目。

span.span: This property is used in an Excel 2007 project.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果控件包含一个常数，则此属性返回的常量。If the control contains a constant, this property returns the constant. 如果控件为空，则此属性返回一个空字符串。If the control is empty, this property returns an empty string. 如果控件包含一个公式，则此属性与在其中它将显示在公式栏 （包括等号） 相同的格式以字符串形式返回该公式。If the control contains a formula, this property returns the formula as a string in the same format in which it would be displayed in the formula bar (including the equal sign). 如果你设置的值或公式控制为日期，Microsoft Office Excel 将检查以查看是否使用日期或时间的数字格式之一已格式化该单元格。If you set the value or formula of an control to a date, Microsoft Office Excel checks to see whether that cell is already formatted with one of the date or time number formats. 如果没有，Excel 更改为默认的短日期数字格式的数字格式。If not, Excel changes the number format to the default short date number format. ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用属性设置的值为相等的单元格 A1 和 A2 的值的总和。The following code example uses the property to set the value of an to equal the sum of the values of cells A1 and A2. 此代码示例假定当前工作表包含名为`CustomerAddress1Cell`类型的相应架构元素使用`int`。This code example assumes that the current worksheet contains an named `CustomerAddress1Cell` with a corresponding schema element of type `int`. remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性应与以下参数一起使用。The property is intended to be used with the following parameters. |参数Parameter|描述Description| |---------------|-----------------| |`RowIndex`|单元格的索引号你想要访问，请按从左到右的顺序。The index number of the cell you want to access, in order from left to right.| |`ColumnIndex`|数字或字符串，指示你想要访问，该单元格的列号开头 1 或"A"的范围中的第一列。A number or string that indicates the column number of the cell you want to access, starting with either 1 or "A" for the first column in the range.| 如果你尝试使用而不指定任何参数，将获取对象属于的 Office 开发工具在 Visual Studio 基础结构和不应在代码中直接使用。If you attempt to use without specifying any parameters, will get an object that is part of the Office development tools in Visual Studio infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code. `RowIndex`和`ColumnIndex`自变量是相对偏移量。The `RowIndex` and `ColumnIndex` arguments are relative offsets. 换而言之，指定`RowIndex`1 的范围不工作表中的第一行的第一行中返回的单元格。In other words, specifying a `RowIndex` of 1 returns cells in the first row of the range, not the first row of the worksheet. ## 可选参数Optional Parameters 可选参数的信息，请参阅[Office 解决方案中的可选参数](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions.md)。For information on optional parameters, see [Optional Parameters in Office Solutions](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用属性以选择从偏移量的单元格由三个列和三个行。The following code example uses the property to select the cell that is offset from an by three columns and three rows. 此代码示例假定当前工作表包含名为`CustomerLastNameCell`。This code example assumes that the current worksheet contains an named `CustomerLastNameCell`. summary.span: 重新排列 控件中的文本以使其均匀填充范围。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果范围不足够大，Microsoft Office Excel 会显示一消息，告知你文本范围的扩展。If the range is not large enough, Microsoft Office Excel displays a message telling you that text extends below the range. 如果你单击**确定**按钮，对齐的文本替换中扩展到所选范围之外的单元格的内容。If you click the **OK** button, justified text replaces the contents in cells that extend beyond the selected range. 若要防止出现此消息，将设置属性`false`。To prevent this message from appearing, set the property to `false`. 设置此属性后，文本始终替换下面的单元中的内容控件。After you set this property, text always replaces the contents in cells below the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性应与以下参数一起使用。The property is intended to be used with the following parameters. |参数Parameter|描述Description| |---------------|-----------------| |`RowSize`|新的范围中的行数。The number of rows in the new range. 如果省略此参数，该范围中的行数保持不变。If this argument is omitted, the number of rows in the range remains the same.| |`ColumnSize`|新的范围中的列数。The number of columns in the new range. 如果省略此参数，该范围中的列数保持不变。If this argument is omitted, the number of columns in the range remains the same.| 如果你尝试使用而不指定任何参数，将获取对象属于的 Office 开发工具在 Visual Studio 基础结构和不应在代码中直接使用。If you attempt to use without specifying any parameters, will get an object that is part of Office development tools in Visual Studio infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code. ## 可选参数Optional Parameters 可选参数的信息，请参阅[Office 解决方案中的可选参数](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions.md)。For information on optional parameters, see [Optional Parameters in Office Solutions](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用属性以获得更大范围基于，然后选择新的范围。The following code example uses the property to get a larger range based on an , and then selects the new range. 此代码示例假定当前工作表包含名为`CustomerLastNameCell`。This code example assumes that the current worksheet contains an named `CustomerLastNameCell`. remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果控件位于数据透视表中，此属性设置为`true`如果项显示详细信息。If the control is in a PivotTable report, this property is set to `true` if the item is showing detail. 如果控件不在数据透视表，以下语句为 true:If the control is not in a PivotTable report, the following statements are true: - 控件必须为单个摘要行或列中。The control must be in a single summary row or column. - 此属性返回`false`如果任何行或列的子级处于隐藏状态。This property returns `false` if any of the children of the row or column are hidden. - 此属性设置为`true`等效于显示的摘要行或列的所有子级。Setting this property to `true` is equivalent to showing all the children of the summary row or column. - 此属性设置为`false`等效于隐藏摘要行或列的所有子级。Setting this property to `false` is equivalent to hiding all the children of the summary row or column.
